text:
@PeteButtigieg @lbanter1 COVID-19 is not political, it does not care about beliefs, or spin, or marketing.

It is a parasite that will use the body to replicate and infect the next host at the first opportunity.

Please retweet

#WearAMaskSaveALife #MasksSaveLives https://t.co/dxBLk1yXLG
